poemsDataJson.list_full: かくとだに えやはいぶきの さしも草(ぐさ) さしも知(し)らじな 燃(も)ゆる思(おも)ひを
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: How can I tell her//How fierce my love for her is?//Will she understand//That the love I feel for her//Burns like Ibuki's fire plant?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kaku to dani|Eyawa ibuki no|Sashimo-gusa|Sashimo shiraji na|Moyuru omoi o
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: さしもしらしな もゆるおもひを
poemsDataJson.author: 藤原実方朝臣(ふじわらのさねかたあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 胸にあまる切ない恋心を相手に訴えようとする心
